item.title: MongoDB Vertical Scaling Overview
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. This is an Enterprise-only feature. Please install KubeDB Enterprise Edition to try this feature. MongoDB Vertical Scaling This guide will give an overview on how KubeDB Enterprise operator updates the resources(for example CPU and Memory etc.) of the MongoDB database. Before You Begin You should be familiar with the following KubeDB concepts: MongoDB MongoDBOpsRequest How Vertical Scaling Process Works The following diagram shows how KubeDB Enterprise operator updates the resources of the MongoDB database.

item.title: Vertical Scaling MongoDB Replicaset
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. This is an Enterprise-only feature. Please install KubeDB Enterprise Edition to try this feature. Vertical Scale MongoDB Replicaset This guide will show you how to use KubeDB Enterprise operator to update the resources of a MongoDB replicaset database. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster.
